snippet: Residents fell just short in February of the state’s mandated water conservation target, officials said Monday.
abstract: Officials report that California fell short of mandated water conservation goal in February, cutting usage by 23.9 percent rather than 25 percent ordered by Gov Jerry Brown; residents will now be required to use 20 percent less during fifth year of drought.
lead_paragraph: Residents fell just short in February of the state’s mandated water conservation target, officials said Monday.

headline.main: California: Water Savings Just Miss Target
headline.print_headline: California: Water Savings Just Miss Target
